DarkMouse::

She walked closer tot he body and kicked it lightly with her 
foot."Well, that's the last we'll see of that turkey." she said with 
a chuckle. She looked up at Black Nightmare. "Your the one who came 
to talk to KitKat aren't you. Well, let's get you and your team 
inside and patched up. Then you can talk to KitKat."
She fired one more blast at the turkey body, just to make sure. Then 
walked over to the ramp and went inside.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> Bounty tried to dodge the feather with bad results, though it 
missed his
> spark it still went through his shoulder pinning him to the 
wall. "Release
> me at once or suffer charges of intent." The four fireing at him 
seemed
> unimpressed. Without mobility his Temporal displacer was useless. 
The
> autoguns locked on, the Bat probes pummeled him, Blacknightmare, 
Mantys,
> Wespa, and Darkmouse all had an open shot. The blasters bounced off 
his body
> until his resistance to damage wore thin. The first blast 
penetrated his
> left arm, then one shot through the shoulder with the blade ripping 
his arm
> off. "AAAAAAHHHHHHHHHHH" Bounty yelled until a blast severed his 
neck
> causing his head to fall to the ground. Eventually the attackers 
stopped
> firing and the hole filled body fell to the ground nonfunctional. 
His spark
> hovered out of his body and fell to the ground extinguishing 
itself. A last
> flinch of neural discharge caused the body to jump one last time 
before
> laying still forever.
> 
> 
> With it's pilot destroyed the Ship he arrived in disapeared back to 
whatever
> time it had come from leaving no evidence that it had existed in 
the first
> place.
> 
>
